column4: My usb hard drive is not getting detected. anyone help, please...
Have you tried unplugging/reinserting the USB key?
yes. i have tried. it was working fine till yesterday.
Try "rmmod -f ehci_hcd" and see if that allows connection
I find ehci_hcd kind of unreliable, sometimes it works perfectly, other times it doesn't work at all.
Try connecting your USB drive again
Is it unmounted, or not connected at all?
it is connected. but its not getting detected .. it used to get automounted before. now nothing happens.
